.[COLOR lime] PIRLO TV[/COLOR] [COLOR blue][I]SportDevil[/I][/COLOR] $doregex[makelist]
makelist
<title>[COLOR coral][makelist.param1][/COLOR] • [COLOR skyblue][B][makelist.param3][/B][/COLOR][COLOR skyblue][makelist.param4][/COLOR]</title> <sportsdevil>http://www.pirlotvlive.com/[makelist.param2]</sportsdevil> <referer>http://www.pirlotvlive.com</referer>
t\"\>(.*?)\<[\w\W\s]{0,120}../(.*?)"[\w\W\s]{0,10}blank">(.*?)<[\w\W\s]{0,2}>(.*?)< http://www.pirlotvlive.com/
http://www.intergoles.com/pirlotv/images/pirlotv.jpg
. [COLOR lime] Wizhdsports [/COLOR](Ver Programación en la web) http://wizhdsports.com/images/wiz.jpg http://media.zenfs.com/es_ES/Sports/Eurosport/1450039-30997683-2560-1440.jpg
. [COLOR lime]Wizhdsports[/COLOR] $doregex[makelist]
makelist
<title>[makelist.param2]--[makelist.param1]</title> <link>$doregex[makelist2]</link> <referer>http://wizhdsports.com</referer>
(?s)class="match".+?class="name">\s*(.+?)\s*<.*?margin.*?>([\d:\s-]+).+?channel.+?>(.+?)<script http://wizhdsports.com/ Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:19.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/19.0
makelist2
<title>Stream [makelist2.param1]</title> <link>$doregex[getUrl]</link>
(?s)float:left.{4,10}href.+?Stream\s*(\d+)\s*<\/a [makelist.param3] Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:19.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/19.0
getUrl #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m, param=''):
import requests import re import base64
try:
id = re.findall("javascript.*?id='(.*?)'", page_data)[0] url = 'http://bro.adca.st/stream.php?id=' + id + '&width=640&height=480' headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (X11 Linux i686 rv:42.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/42.0 Iceweasel/42.0', 'Referer': 'http://wizhdsports.com/live/stream20.php'} source = requests.get(url, headers = headers) curl = re.findall('curl = "(.*?)"', source.text)[0] m3u8 = base64.b64decode(curl)
url2 = 'http://bro.adca.st/getToken.php' headers2 = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (X11 Linux i686 rv:42.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/42.0 Iceweasel/42.0', 'Referer': url, 'X-Requested-With': 'XMLHttpRequest'} source2 = requests.get(url2, headers = headers2) token = re.findall('"token":"(.*?)"', source2.text)[0]
return m3u8 + token + '|Referer=http://cdn.bro.adca.st/jwplayer.flash.swf&User-Agent=Mozilla/5.0 (X11 Linux i686 rv:42.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/42.0 Iceweasel/42.0'
except Exception as e: print 'wizhdsports: Error: ' if hasattr(e, 'code'): print str(e.code) if hasattr(e, 'reason'): print " " + str(e.reason)
http://wizhdsports.com/live/stream[makelist2.param1].php http://wizhdsports.com/ Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:19.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/19.0
http://wizhdsports.com/images/wiz.jpg http://media.zenfs.com/es_ES/Sports/Eurosport/1450039-30997683-2560-1440.jpg
